website_summaries.verdict: A kit full of smaller, stylish stones ideal for 1-2 events or manicures.
pros: Kit includes a range of stones, 3D nail decorations, stickers, and more
All of the stones and decorations are on the smaller side, perfect for adding subtle flair
12-section storage box is ideal for keeping your stones organized
cons: Some complaints of the stones falling off after 2 to 3 days

customer_reviews.title: Eh, not as impressive as I was hoping
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bad kit but it's not as impressive as I was hoping it would be. And not as do it yourself friendly either. The small strings (i'm not sure what they are but I think they are just small gold thread pieces) are really hard to work with due to their size and the moons don't glue down perfectly because they are metal and not very maluable so you have to put a clear top coat on if you're using the moons
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I love how much of a variety you get.This is a really good deal plus the quality of these charms are amazing and there are so many charms to choose from. The sizes of the charms are perfect for nails.This also includes the tweezer which makes it extremely helpful to pick up the charms, especially the small ones. I would definitely recommend this !
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: You will receive a lot for your money. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: cdsd

customer_reviews.title: Good for a weekend event
customer_reviews.text: Stayed on nails for about 3 days max and then they start to pop off. Good for a weekend event, but not so good for a longer trip.
customer_reviews.author: TKD Diva

customer_reviews.title: Awesome nail gems
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this..she does her nails at home n this was one of her bday gifts!!
customer_reviews.author: robert tippett

customer_reviews.title: Great to have
customer_reviews.text: Nice kits with a lot of variety of styles and patterns. Pretty stickers. They made good combination. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: GY

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I am a nail salon owner. I found out these decorations are so cool for my nail art design. I use it every day. Especially for my Halloween mail design. My customers love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Just gorgeous.
customer_reviews.text: Great sets of beads, stones and bling. I will be using these regularly. Arrived quickly and in excellent condition.Just gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: tamo

customer_reviews.title: The roses are beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The roses looked quite plain in box but worked well on nails. Have not tried the watermark stuff but plan to do so. Not sure what to do with the golden strings---need to be creative with the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Dollar store
customer_reviews.text: sorely disappointed!!! I could have gone to the $ store and purchased this for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mystyc1

customer_reviews.title: Great product, unfortunate shipping
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived a bit later than expected, but came as described. Brought some of the pieces to my nail tech during my last appointment.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Love Decals!
customer_reviews.text: In this nail kit you do get a lot of options. I loved the decals, rhinestones, metal rivets. The tweezer set come in handy to pick up all of the small accessories. Loved how the rhinestone come in a plastic divided container. The bad the fimo designs and gold lines are very hard to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Blair

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these im a self taught nail artist
customer_reviews.author: mrs. williams

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute
customer_reviews.text: A good variety of cute things. I don’t understand the gold thread though... I totally was hoping it was thin wire.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

product_meta.title: 3D Nail Art Decoration Kits Nail Rhinestones Glitter Sequins Diamonds Metallic Rivets Studs Gold Geometric Patterns Fimo Fruit Slices Pearl DIY Accessories Nails Tips (Bi011A)
product_meta.description:
Color:Bi011aThis set easy to be applied on your nails and can keep for longer time.Can be apply on natural or artificial nails. 
Easy portability, Suitable for both professional salon or home use. Ideal for decorating your nail;also bags, belts, leather bracelets, shoes, etc

Item package:
1*12 grids nail Rhinestones
1*Hollow metal nail studs
1*Gold Nail line
2*Tweezers

3D Nail Art Decoration
Box Size: 13*5 cm & 12 Grids 
Weight: 29g
Material: Metal, Acrylic
Storage In individual transparent jars. 

Nail hollow Metal decoration box
Quantity: 100 pieces plus.
Weight: 13g
Material: Alloy, Acrylic

Gold nail lines
Quantity: 100 pieces plus.
Per gold line length: 2cm
Weight: 10g
Material:Plastic

Tweezers: We send it by free, is for nail sticker rhinestone picker.

Usage
Clean the surface of your nails, brush the base polish, and place it onto nails
You can also use them to decorate your home, cell phone's case, glasses, made card and body art, etc.
feature_bullets: Nail kits including: 1 box mixed design nail accessories kits,1 box Metal Nail jewelry set, 1 box gold nail lines, 2 nail tweezers. This nail design kit can meet your different needs.
12 in 1 Nail Art Box: There have 12 difference design and colors. Including: rhinestones, metallic rivets studs, fruit fimo, star and heart glitters, flower, rose, diamonds and half pearl etc.
Special hollow design box: the rivet are different from other normal decoration,making your nails more attractive.Including: star,moon,Circle and color diamonds etc.
Gold nail lines: this is a new products, It Make Your Nails Look Elegant and Special.
